data.title: Tourist Helpdesk
data.meta_description: This is a Tourist Helpdesk page. Take the SEIBU RAILWAY and COME SEE SEIBU!
data.text:
SEIBU Tourist Information Center Ikebukuro

Location: Seibu Line 1F East Exit at Ikebukuro Station

Business hours: 8:00~15:00 all year

Available languages: English, Chinese and Korean (not always on hand)

Can provide sightseeing information on the Seibu lines and the Ikebukuro area, Seibu line tickets, 「Skyliner Value Ticket」for Narita airport*, and Tokyo Metro「Tokyo Subway Ticket」are available here.

*valid only on date of use

Shinjuku Prince Hotel Bell Captain's Desk

Tourist information center certified by Japan National Tourism Organization (JNTO)

Business hours: Open 24 hours

Location: Shinjuku Prince Hotel 1F Bell Captain's Desk

Provide information on sightseeing, shopping, and also sells train (Kawagoe Access Ticket), limousine bus, and other tickets.

*Multilingual staff on duty for the day will be posted every day
